titles.title: Expressing support for dance as a form of valuable exercise and of artistic expression, and for the designation of September 21, 2019, as National Dance Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of a National Dance Day.
